resources.string: This unalloyed lens basically yet magically reduces zooming difficulty twice
This immense rusty anchor will speed up your game-immersion 4 times
With this scientific device you will see every inch of the fractal 8 times sharper
Take this red pill and witness how deep the rabbit hole goes. Instant 16x boost
Even a sip of this spell is enough to obtain a 32x magnification effect
This renowned but simple tool will diminish the game difficulty 64 times
Via this shard of space-time you will reach velocities 128 times faster than light
This rare Orb of Zoom grants its owner permanent 256x zoom superpower
This Sun-Orange blossom is just as beautiful as it is imagined
Nebula-Green shades of this color will add the game some notes of calm
This Pink Dwarf color not only looks but also sounds like something amazing
Those Galaxy-Violet tones will saturate your zooming experience with new dyes
As dark as Black Holes are - you will enjoy the minimalism and simplicity
This Comet-White look will reveal you all the dark corners of the fractal
This Supernova collapse radiance is so bright that it Inverses the game colors
As the Big Bang brought life to the Universe, would this Gradient satiate your mirth
